About US
Leading the best Music management and promotion agency
One of the greatest music promotion businesses, Groove Music Promotion has been a leader in the field for more than five years. We began as a tiny business in 2018. We currently work with over 1000 artists worldwide, offering high-quality, dependable marketing campaigns to get their music in front of the target audience.
We are a dynamic, successful, and trustworthy business that has helped numerous artists realize their aspirations while exceeding their expectations.
Our founder, Bhathiya Konage, is the creator of Groove Music Promotion. He was an artist who was struggling to reach his intended audience with his music and who persisted in faith in a promotion agency that no one could trust. At this point, Bhathiya had developed his own idea for starting a solid music organization called Groove Music Promotion to support all artists by offering high-quality, dependable, and long-lasting music promotion.
//
